entry.string: The release module is Xaraya.com's tool of tracking module and theme information. It does this in three distinct ways.
entry.translation: Zee releese-a mudoole-a is Xereya.cum's tuul ooff treckeeng mudoole-a und zeeme-a inffurmeshun. It dues thees in three-a deestinct veys. Um gesh dee bork, bork!
